oui mais attention car toute rage peut arrive a tout moment envie de meurtre et apres de se suicidé xD

Alors oui pour " L'authenticité " du jeu 
-Le jeu est assez simple a prendre en main quand on connait le genre " fps" 
-C'est une licence qui a de l'expérience de part ses nombreux jeux et donc qui les faits bien 
-Vif et beaucoup de chose a apprendre au delà des maps, armes et etc .... Il y a les lignes/lanes par maps a connaître des noms a connaître fin le jeu est diversifié dans sa façon de jouer
Mais non pour le nombre de cheater qu'il y a en occasionnel ou en compétitive
Since a recent udate the servers are fucked.The game freezes about one every two rounds and it becomes unplayable.Valve get your shit together
Im in silver hell but the skins do be looking nice 10/10
Aunque suelen haber problemas con hackers, es un juego muy bueno con el cual te aseguras unas horas de entretenimiento y mucho mas si lo juegas con amigos.

Great game to learn about team work, connect with new friends to have a great time. Not so great when playing with players who are below your rank as they would happily report you for their silly mistakes aka walking around looking improtant with their heads up high
Got Aids by Russians xD. 10/10 recomend
2800 hrs play and i still dont know what to say abt this game
Um dos meus jogos preferidos, porém é frustante saber que existem tantos hackers. Não sabemos se o cara é legit ou hacker, isso estraga a experiência.

Hacks...! Just hacks everywhere.... skeet.cc, neverlose.cc and so on... Valve has no motivation to do something against it, as long players are stupid and addicted enough, to buy keys for their scamming loot boxes... but it´s your time and money... A REAL miracle, GabeN did not have a stroke, by laughing above all us poor, money and time spending addicted. As long, as they are earning money there will be no end in sight with this catch-22.... GOOD LUCK AND HAVE FUN!! =DDDD
